1303880.name: They Breathe Original Soundtrack
1303880.description:
CAN YOU HEAR IT?
With They Breathe, sound designer Kristian Johansson and composer Joel Bille deliver a soundtrack that keeps changing and evolving with the game. Balancing on the edge of real and surreal, it is equal parts ambient sounds and music. So lean back, close your eyes and experience the atmospheric and creepy soundscape of They Breathe.
